decks.notes: This deck is focused on playing aggressively with Rakdos-colored cards, aiming to quickly damage and overpower the opponent. The deck includes a variety of removal spells, hand disruption, and powerful creatures like Archfiend of the Dross and Unstoppable Slasher. It also features lands that can produce both black and red mana to ensure consistent and efficient plays. The strategy revolves around quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of direct damage, creature removal, and powerful threats on the board.

The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Indomitable Creativity and Pawpatch Formation to combo off and generate powerful synergies with cards like Titan of Industry and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. It also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Zombify to help recur key combo pieces. The deck aims to be versatile and unpredictable, using a mix of aggressive threats and disruptive spells like Torch the Tower and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own powerful combos.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays, utilizing creatures with low mana costs and abilities that provide bonus damage or pump up the team. The deck also includes burn spells and combat tricks to maintain pressure on the opponent. Jegantha, the Wellspring is included as a companion to provide additional mana consistency. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures and direct damage spells, ending the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying creatures and using burn spells to deal damage to the opponent's face, aiming to close out games before the opponent can stabilize. The deck also includes cards like Claim / Fame and Monstrous Rage to further increase the aggression and pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an additional layer of versatility and consistency to the deck, allowing for a strong, aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on aggressive tactics with the use of Spirit creatures to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards that provide evasion, disruption, and protection, such as Rattlechains, Spell Queller, and Supreme Phantom, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and control the board. The inclusion of versatile cards like Skyclave Apparition and Shacklegeist allows for flexibility in dealing with various threats. Additionally, The Wandering Emperor provides a powerful finisher to secure victory. Overall, the deck aims to maintain a strong tempo and consistently apply pressure to secure a win.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures to generate value and control the board using cards like Mayhem Devil and Cauldron Familiar. The deck also utilizes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Ygra, Eater of All for additional value and pressure. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful threats and efficient removal spells like Fatal Push. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional mana fixing and flexibility to the deck. Overall, this deck thrives on synergy and aggression to outpace opponents and secure victory.
